segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how focused he is, stretching as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, but he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, like he’s prepared.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies he’s planning to take.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting for him to share, and it’s so sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall, but I’m also impressed by his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a little risky, but it’s also kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get away with it, too.
segments.speaker: PAR
